comment: Ni Huan is terrible. For write in questions she takes of points if its not word for word what she wants. I took app stats with another professor and turns out the material isnt really that hard, I got a B. Ni Huan just takes it to a whole new level and makes it as hard as she can.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: Started our class with about 80 people. About 25 passed the class. Lowest final grade I've ever had in college was an 84, I out right failed the class. Terrible teacher, do not take her. I'm taking Econ 3300 again with a different teacher right now and have an A in the class so far.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy

comment: Did I barely skid by with a C? Yes. But this was one of the best classes I have taken. Professor Ni tells you day 1 how hard this class was gonna be and boy was she right. She makes you WORK for that grade. But if you do what she says for study practice, attend the classes, and show you care, you'll be okay. MAKE FRIENDS. Cannot stress that enough.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Amazing lectures --Test heavy

comment: Best professor ever. Took her for Healthcare Economics. 3 tests. Homework and attendance was optional. If you showed up you got an extra 5 points added to your total grade. Homework grade if you got 100 on the hw that's another 5 points added to your total grade. Just show up and you'll get an A. She's also so unintentionally funny.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Hilarious

comment: Her class was so unnecessarily hard. I am retaking with another professor and learning way more. Passing it with an A. She does not go over her study guides and doesn't tell you how she reached an answer.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: Professor has a very high drop rate and an equal as high fail rate. DO NOT TAKE UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Ni is very passionate and cares a lot about making sure the students ACTUALLY LEARN that material, she has strict but fair guidelines with what she expects. Attendance isn't mandatory and neither is the textbook, but the class is fast paced and you will fall behind if you miss class. She is very accommodating available outside of class.
rating_tags: Caring--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Don't let the other reviews scare you! Professor Ni is one of the best professors I've ever had. She warns everyone at the beginning that her class won't be a "piece of cake" and that you need to attend class and most importantly DO THE PRACTICE SETS. If you want to learn something I suggest you take her. P.S. There are bonus points for attendance
rating_tags: Participation matters--Hilarious--Test heavy

comment: If you take this class, know you will have to put the work in. The guided notes make it easier to follow along but you HAVE TO GO TO CLASS -- that is the only way to be successful fr
rating_tags: Participation matters--Caring--Accessible outside class

comment: Take this professor only if you ABSOLUTELY have to. In my 8 years of college and 2 degrees, this is the worst professor that can happen to be in your classroom.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Test heavy

comment: This class is not easy no matter what professor you take. Professor Ni Huan is a very good teacher. If you want an easy grade do not take her. If you want to put in the work and actual learn something then I highly suggest you take her. Nothing is easy in this class. You need to put in work to pass this class. Study groups are my suggestion.
rating_tags: Tough grader--EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things

comment: She knows a lot about the subject but she doesn't communicate it well.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Graded by few things

comment: Avoid at all costs. Hard to understand as she has an accent. Hand writing is very difficult to read. Half of lecture is spent yelling at students. Other half rushing over lectures. 3 tests and an excel assignment. mess up one exam and you're done. honestly would avoid but it is required for mgmt 4990. any other option unless ur good at math. great
rating_tags: Tough grader--Test heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Her lectures were just for watching her write down the material by hand. It was difficult to take good notes because she speaks quickly with a heavy accent, and has messy handwriting. No electronics unless you sit in the front row. The final grade is based on 3 tests and a project. I am very disappointed, this is the only class I have ever dropped.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: I WILL NEVER TAKE HER CLASS AGAIN. I've never had such a tough professor, where she questions everything if its not done the way she wants you to do it. After taking her class it is very much clear that I am not fit for Kennesaw state university. Transfer here I come.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: Everyone saying that she is bad is just lazy. You will have to put in some work for an A, but you can tell that she WANTS everyone to do well. She gives you more than enough to be able to do well. The class is based on 3 test grades alone, no homework or quizzes. She is always available to answer questions if you get confused. Overall great class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Almost done with this class, currently looking back at the notes. Very hard to read, they are a mess and with terrible explanations. The notes are literal chicken scratch and about 70% of the class has already dropped. She gives you practice problems that are not gone over in class but only gives you an answer sheet w no explanations. DO NOT TAKE
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: She is literally the worst professor I've ever had. She covers her videos in class, making class pointless. Then, after you've spent hours watching her heavily accented videos with chicken-scratch for notes, you show up for one of only three tests in the class to find that the questions don't even match the videos. DO NOT TAKE HER. You will fail.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Professor Ni was less than helpful in this online class I had with her due to Covid. She only provided us with video lectures and quizzes that had the correct answers with no explanations. The class is only based on 3 tests. She rewards those who pass and punishes those who fail. She's tough to get in touch with and doesn't care if we pass or fail.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Honestly one of the worst professors that I've had. She requires you to watch videos and read illegible notes and her classes just go over highlights from those videos. Your entire class grade only comes from 3 tests. Almost always holds the class 10 or more minutes over. Took almost a week to respond to an email, and didn't even answer anything.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: This class is graded solely on 3 tests which we had to study for using the professors handwritten notes, these notes where illegible and did not prepare me or my classmates for the exam as many including myself where forced to drop this class. She was uncompromising when we reached out to her about exams. I would definitely recommend against her.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: Do not take Business Statistics with this professor. She only gives 3 very hard tests and that is it. Her notes are very hard to read and even after asking of her to improve them she proceeded not to. This class with this professor basically puts you up to failure. One bad day on a test and there goes your grade. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!
rating_tags: Tough grader

comment: Took her class online. 3 Exams only. No Homework. No Quizzes. She had video notes that were extremely hard to read and understand. A large portion of the class failed the first exam and she didn't curve. She literally gave 3 bonus points to those who passed ONLY. She wants you to fail. She made the second exam harder because we weren't trying.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: Terrible professor, do not recommend at all. The notes and practice questions do not help with the test. The scanned notes are terrible you cannot read her handwriting. She did everything in her power to make this class difficult even though ECON 2300 is hard as is. Just do not do it.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: Do not set yourself up by taking this class. She only grades 3 tests and they are difficult. She doesn't explain the information enough and she doesn't answer questions
Please stay away from her !! Unless you are very good in math.

Business Statistics is a hard class so any professor you take wont make it any easier. Professor Huan really knows her stuff, and despite a strong accent and sloppy handwriting I think she is an amazing teacher. She gives you everything you need to pass and more, you just have to pay attention in class and do the practice. She is an over-motivator.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Test heavy--Lecture heavy

comment: She is very smart and chooses to make this class ridiculously hard. Unless you are a math wizard, stay away. If you aren't and you take her you will probably regret it. I took her over the summer. Getting my B was blood, sweat, and tears tbh. If you do take her... DO THE PRACTICE and go to class!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Do not take if you want to get a good grade. Cant understand a word she says, practice is NOTHING like the tests. I studied for multiple hours and days and still did not do well on her tests. DO NOT TAKE
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Tough grader

comment: PLEASE.. do not take this professor. I wish I had read the comments before signing up for her class. I barely passed. Her tests are very tough. she has the worst hand writing and has very unorganized lectures. I would study for hours and still struggled. her tests were not as similar to the practice like she says they are.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Lecture heavy--Tough grader

comment: She is a very passionate, awesome professor. She makes you work for your grade and you must study but I feel like that is Stats across the board. Hard class, hard tests, but she is an awesome professor- 3 tests make up the total of your grade but expect to work for it!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Ni gives you the tools to pass if you follow her instructions. The class is hard, but her practice sets are very similar to the test, if you do them you will have no issues passing. I took her for 2300 and 3300 and I'd do it again. Definitely hook up with a study group DO THE PRACTICE!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: This is not an easy class but she tries to curve as much as possible. The tests are exactly the same as the notes and practice problems, so if you go to class, pay attention, and study weekly you should do fine.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: You should not consider taking this professor if you can check off at least two of these: 1. have a full course load 2. work a full-time job 3. cannot commit to 10+ hours weekly to studying & doing homework 4. are not accepting of the possibility of scoring a 'C' grade (or worse) 5. not accustomed to taking detailed notes & attending most classes
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: We all know that this is one of the hardest class. I liked her teaching style. She is little strict but I liked her class. Her tests are not easy but doesn't ask anything out of context. You are good if you attend every class and pay attention and do your practice problems before the test. I made A in this class but not an easy A. She is good.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Definitely had to work for it. I have a 3.9 and am a senior and by the skin of my teeth got an A. It was only due to perfect attatendance, days of studying and going to the tutor lab two times a week for the first time in my life. She does not teach well but is extremely smart. It's just a self taught, have to work for kind of class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Worst professor I've had at Kennesaw. I went to every class and made a zero on every quiz. Forgot to mention that theres pop quizzes. Also spent days studying and also went to the help center and her office hours and got help for test and still managed to fail the class. Worst professor I've ever had. DO NOT TAKE.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tests are tough

comment: Good professor and not a terrible class. This subject is difficult already and she explains everything step by step. She does have an accent but if you pay attention you will be fine. Sit up front, print out the notes and bring them to class and DO THE PRACTICE PROBLEMS!! She wants you to do good and is super helpful. Class was curved.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Took her for Econ 2200 and 3100. She is by far one of the best professors I've ever had! Test heavy but if you come to class and participate she curves your grade. She really cares about her students and wants you to do well. She's tough but if you work hard she helps you get the grade you deserve!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Talks down to students.  Tests are extremely difficult.  Take anyone else if you can.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: The Business Statistics class is tough. Her writing is illegible so expect to ask her what she wrote a lot. No going over practice work problems. I believe its her teaching methods that don't work. Obviously with 3/4 of the class failing, its not the students. Other professors teach differently out of the same book.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: If you never take Econ 2300 and need to take it for yor major, please don't sign up for her class. Runnnnn. She is the(.....) professor ever.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: I beg you... DO NOT TAKE HER!!  She tells you that only a few people will pass the class on the first day.  Even if this is the last class you need to graduate- hand in there for another semester and pick another professor!

This class was TOUGH. She teaches the material to the best of her ability, but there is no curve for the 3 tests which constitute your grade. Thankfully, her grading scale is curved. If you have a 65, that's a C. I barely got away with a C. Be prepared to spend hours on hours studying for this class and preparing for the tests. Get a study partner!

Definitely not an easy class, but she's a fantastic teacher! She'll tell you day one that 'This is a hard class, you will not pass if you don't put in the effort." If I have a chance to take her again I definitely will. ** Make sure you see her in during her office ours **

3 tests. No homework, no project, no quizzes. It is really hard to understand when she writes . Instructor Ni is a tough grader and the partial credit she gives is nothing to compare with the amount of  points she takes out because of small errors. I do not recommend this instructor!
Please take someone else. She is hard.

Difficult teacher & its hard to pass her class. only 3 tests &no final &some bonus. if you have a bad test that is it for your grade bc no hw or quizzes or anything. hard on d grading.Her notes have too much info & her hand writing is awful and her accent is difficult to understand. Run away,there r better teachers to take this class here at KSU.

She can be hard to understand and her handwriting is awful, but she does NOT use the book (save $100+) and she explains things very well.  You must study to pass her class and you get bonus for showing up.  This is the only class I have had perfect attendance in in 5 years! The material is tough, but she is a great teacher. She gives only 3 tests.

Understandable, and she is really helpful. Sh just uses her lecture note. All you need to do is take the note exactly what she writes every classes. Test is pretty reasonable. Go to the class and take a note. You will be fine.
Great professor. You need to work hard to get an A, test are based on the lecture notes. Do not miss class. She does not use the book, so do not bother to buy it.

1 did not like the class the first few days i attended but once i got used to her teaching style, i was able to understand the information clearly. Take her if you are looking for a professor who will push you to work hard and maximize your potential but if you want an easy A please pick another prof. She never uses the book so no need to buy one

Do not take her. She is kind of helpful, but its very hard to understand her, partially because of her accent and partially because she is a bad teacher. She also makes the class way harder than it needs to be. Do not take her.
Great professor who wants you to pass the course.  She wants you to understand the concepts taught in the class.  Gives you practice tests and lecture notes.
impossible to understand.
very hard teacher to understand.
